cleaned_text: Jun The New York Center for Integrative Health in Manhattan, New York, provides a wide range of services for patients in the community. This includes naturopathic medicine. When looking for holistic care, connecting with a naturopathic doctor in your area is the first step toward a healthier you! [Our team](https://www.nycintegrative.com/meet-dr-robert-kachko/) can evaluate you and talk to you about your health needs, and then provide services and solutions to reach your goals. Our New York Center for Integrative Health team defines a naturopathic doctor as a professional trained in natural medicine focusing on preventive care and health promotion. Naturopathic doctors recognize the healing power of nature and will recommend evidence-based solutions that are both safe and effective. They employ services such as lifestyle counseling, nutritional guidance, herbal remedies, homeopathy, and therapies to help prevent illness and promote better health and wellness to improve one's quality of life.
